mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-03-07 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.shortTitle: 2021-03-07 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.description:
Recorded live Mar. 7, 2021. All recently released tracks in the genres of Post-Punk, Darkwave, Coldwave, Minimal / Dark Synth, EBM, Gothic, Synthpop, and related.

Playlist:
